bilingual.source: We were asked to stand in two lines three meters apart.
bilingual.target: 我们被要求站成两列，相距三米。

bilingual.source: They are situated on the same street, only a hundred meters apart, on each side of the street.
bilingual.target: 他们位于同一条街上，街道两边相距仅一百米。

bilingual.source: The two towns are about five kilometer apart.

bilingual.target: 他们的观点仍然相距甚远。

bilingual.source: They spaced out the trees five metres apart.
bilingual.target: 他们使树与树之间相距五米.

bilingual.source: They spaced out the trees five metres apart .
bilingual.target: 他们使树与树之间相距五米。

bilingual.source: New York and Tokyo are thousands of miles apart .
bilingual.target: 纽约和东京相距几千英里。

bilingual.source: The gas molecules are infinitely far apart from one another.
bilingual.target: 气体分子彼此相距无限远。

bilingual.source: Apart: at a distance in place, position, or time.
bilingual.target: 相隔，相距：在地点，方位或时间上成距离。

list.abstract: APaRT（英[əˈpɑːt]，美[əˈpɑːrt]），英语单词，形容词，意思为相距；相隔；在一边地。短语搭配有take apart。例句为“The tubes were placed one yard apart.（管子被放置在相隔一码的地方。）” APaRT形容词类近义词有unusual、different、distinctive等。

yingyinNormal.en: Her attractions are never far apart, and in between, well, merely walking her streets is to wander through picture postcards.
yingyinNormal.zh: 巴黎各个景点彼此都相距不远，在前往下个景点的路上，就像走在风景明信片般的享受。

yingyinNormal.en: In 1929, our country fell apart.
yingyinNormal.zh: 1929年，我国崩溃了。

yingyinNormal.en: I do not speak for the Empire. We stand apart.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我与他们不是一路人。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, that's Lead foot. They rip him apart. Savages.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是铅腿。他死得好惨。一群野蛮人。

yingyinNormal.en: I didn't want our child found, taken apart, dissected.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不想有人抓走我们的孩子不想他被大卸八块，开膛破肚。

yingyinNormal.en: Ross has the blender. Everything's just falling apart.
yingyinNormal.zh: 果汁机在罗斯那里，一切都毁了。

yingyinNormal.en: Everyone drifted apart.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大家渐行渐远。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm being torn apart. I want to be free of this pain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很矛盾，我想摆脱这种痛苦。

yingyinNormal.en: Give me one good reason why I shouldn't rip you apart.
yingyinNormal.zh: 给我一个好理由，让我不致于撕烂你。

yingyinNormal.en: I mean, that place must just be falling apart without me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一定是没我就不行了。

yingyinNormal.en: This is all you wanted? To see them rip each other apart.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你就是你想要的吗？看他们自相残杀。

yingyinNormal.en: My parents go in and the whole building starts coming apart.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我父母掉了进去，整栋楼开始四分五裂。

yingyinNormal.en: So you two were married? What happened? You just drift apart?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们两个结过婚是吧？后来发生了什么事？你们分开了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: For quite some time, the president and I have been growing apart.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在相当长的一段时间里，我和总统已经渐渐疏远。

yingyinNormal.en: It would rip you apart. I'm sorry, no one could survive that trip.
yingyinNormal.zh: 意识的穿越会导致身体撕裂，很抱歉，没人的身体能承受这长途的穿越。

yingyinNormal.en: You get caught up, friendships can come apart. Yeah, I've heard that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一旦你被吸引，友谊的小船说翻就翻。是的，我知道。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, let's just get them apart for a while so they can cool down. Good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那就先把他俩分开，让他们冷静冷静。好。

yingyinNormal.en: Phoebe. You're an amazing woman, and the time we spent apart was unbearable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 菲比，你实在是太好了，我们分开的时候，实在无法让人忍受。

yingyinNormal.en: Though while you sleep, we are apart, your mommy loves you with all her heart.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虽然我们分开睡，但妈咪永远爱你们哦

yingyinNormal.en: You know, guys come onto her all the time, so, you need to set yourself apart.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她平时总是被男人围着，所以，你得矜持一点。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Our legal system was designed to set law <highlight>apart</highlight> from politics precisely because they are so closely tied.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的法律体系旨在将法律与政治区分开来，因为它们是如此紧密地联系在一起。

examination_example.sentence: The framers of the Constitution envisioned law as having authority <highlight>apart</highlight> from politics.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 宪法的制定者设想法律具有独立于政治的权威。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: in or into two or more parts ; into pieces

examination_example.sentence: Nobody wants their worldview torn <highlight>apart</highlight> if loneliness is the outcome.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果结果是孤独，没有人希望自己的世界观被撕裂。

sense_info_list.en: (of two or more people or things) separated by a distance; at a specified distance from each other in time or space

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: (of two or more people or things) separated by a distance; at a specified distance from each other in time or space

examination_example.sentence: The businessmen say that on Earth, beans can easily break <highlight>apart</highlight> and get burned in the roaster.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 商人说，在地球上，豆子很容易碾碎并被烘烤机烤焦。

examination_example.sentence: Scientists at University College London used memory and fluency tests on the same group of people six years <highlight>apart</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 伦敦大学学院的科学家对同一组人进行了相隔六年的记忆力和流畅性测试。

sense_info_list.en: in or into two or more parts ; into pieces

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: in or into two or more parts; into pieces

examination_example.sentence: Do you enjoy taking things <highlight>apart</highlight> and then putting them back together？
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你喜欢把东西拆开，然后把它们装回去吗？

examination_example.sentence: During serious storms, huge waves might cut a sea ship <highlight>apart</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在激烈的风暴中，巨浪可能会将一艘海船撕裂。

examination_example.sentence: Although the storm broke many things <highlight>apart</highlight>,it brought families and neighbors closer together.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然风暴把许多东西打散了，但它使家庭和邻里之间的关系更加紧密。

examination_example.sentence: How to tell good tea <highlight>apart</highlight> from bad tea.
In fact, it was hard for their classmates and teachers to tell them <highlight>apart</highlight> sometimes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，他们的同学和老师有时也很难把他们分开。

examination_example.sentence: The tubes were placed one yard <highlight>apart</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 管子被放置在相隔一码的地方。

examination_example.sentence: The tubes were then placed one yard <highlight>apart</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后，管子被放置在相隔一码的地方。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Apart</highlight> from its cultural meaning, tea is also a medicine, used from ancient times to modern days.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除了文化意义外，茶也是一种药，从古到今都在使用。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Apart</highlight> from being tableware, chopsticks can also be a great gift.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除了作为餐具，筷子也可以是一个很好的礼物。

sense_info_list.en: living or staying in a different place from the person that you are married to or have a close relationship with

examination_example.sentence: The encouraging sentence "Today, being <highlight>apart</highlight> is the best way of being together." is printed below the logo.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 标志下面印有鼓励性的句子“今天，分开是在一起最好的方式”。
